name: Nuclear Bomber Full
description:
In Nuclear Bomber, You are a fighter pilot. Your mission is to repel the enemy invasion. Tactical atomic weapons are authorized. It's gonna be fun on the bun !

The bombs and other objects in the game use 2D realistic physics.

F-16 Armament :
-----------------
* AIM-9 Sidewinder guided short-range air-to-air missiles.
* AGM-65 Maverick tactical air-to-surface missiles.
* Mark 82 – 500 pounds Bombs
* Tactical nuclear weapon.
* Flare for guided missiles

F-35 Armament :
-----------------
* AIM-9 Sidewinder guided short-range air-to-air missiles.
* AGM-114a Hellfire tactical guided air-to-surface missiles.
* Mark 82 – 500 pounds Bombs
* Calls for help from allies
* Flare for guided missiles

NO-ADS
----------------

Game Objects :
---------------
-Air defence systems,
-Anti aircraft vehicles
-Tanks
-Enemy planes,
-Guided missiles
-Allies Jets
-Nuclear Bomb
-Missiles and bombs
-Barracks
-Leaderboard
